Myths and Legends of Oviedo

This is a multipurpose building which is able of holding conferences, high caliber events as well as a shopping cente and a hotel within it. Since it is white it is fairly easy to differentiate and is worth seeing.
Play Voice Description
Write your opinion
The Cathedral of Oviedo is probably the most famous building in the city. It can be seen from almost everywhere all around the city. It is a must do if you ever visit this city.
Is one of the most know places in the city. People gather around for almost everything, tourism, shopping, having lunch... We can say that without a doubt is one of the nexes of the city of Oviedo."

As a matter of fact, being in Spain is a synonym of being in a place where football is the dominant sport. And Oviedo couldn\'t be otherwise. With its local team, Real Oviedo, which has founded in 1926
Gascona is a pretty well located street in the center of Oviedo. It is known fro all its bars and for having some really good prices. Most of the people like having a good time there.

On this tour you get to experience the full Asturian feeling. Get your cider Escanciada eat some cachopo... The tour includes the reservation at the Llagar (Tierra Astur in Gascona street) as well as the food and drinks.
Oviedo City Guide
Asturias Natural Paradise
On this tour you will get see the main historical and famous places in the city. As well as an explanatation of how the city was in the past and how it evolved to become what it is today.
On this tour we will explore the night life of the city. Its creepiest places and some popular legends that relate not only to modern myths but with pretty ancient ones."

Pensión Romero is a nice and comfy 2-star hostel where you can stay in the city center of Oviedo for just 35€ (165 PLN) per night. Depsite the price, breakfasts are included and you are also able to contract other services
This is a mid-high class hotel. It is 4-star building very well located in the city. Its price,which is 66€ (~300 PLN), guaratees a very comfortable stay. You can also enjoy its Spa\'s features.

This is the top when we talk about hotels in Oviedo. In fact, is the only 5-star within the city. For the price of 90€ (415 PLN) you get to stay within a real Barroc palace, full of beatiful decorations.
Since this event is all city wide, there is not an exact location. But we can say that its core is at the city center.

San Mateo, that is the name that gathers up everything that refers to this event. This, is a celebration that happens every year on the 21st of September. It is that big that it lasts for several days.

The San Silvestre is popular race event that happens every 31st of December in the afternoon. On this event people gather up and run in different categories. The main race is the general course where around 5.000 people run

If you ever plan to visit Oviedo you need to visit Santa Maria del Naranco. Although is a little far away from the main city you can access by car or by bus, and for sure the views and sight of the historic place will pay off.
